# my-button



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description                                                                                 | Type                             | Default       |
| ---------- | ---------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------- | ------------- |
| `color`    | `color`    | the background color when type is "contained", the foreground color when type is "outlined" | `"primary" \| "secondary"`       | `'primary'`   |
| `disabled` | `disabled` | indicating disabled button                                                                  | `boolean`                        | `undefined`   |
| `size`     | `size`     | The size of the button                                                                      | `"big" \| "regular" \| "small"`  | `'regular'`   |
| `type`     | `type`     | the type of the button                                                                      | `"contained" \| "outlined"`      | `'contained'` |
| `width`    | `width`    | The width of the button                                                                     | `"medium" \| "narrow" \| "wide"` | `'medium'`    |
